name: WWA vs Chaosdown
description:
Submission for the brackeys game jam 2021.2 with the theme "Let there be chaos"

The game jam was one week long but for reasons I only got about 3 days to make the game so it is kinda buggy and could crash if a character dies but it's still playable and you can get the general idea for it

it's a boxing/wrestling game where every few seconds another challenger intervenes so it gets very chaotic and of course there is no music in the .

Most likely going to update this gamee later

Controls:

WASD: Movement

K: Left jab

L: Right Straight

Q: Change Character (Doest work well)

E: Change Target

R: Restart

When you win the game just restarts
